original_text: While Peter was still thinking about his dream, the Holy Spirit said to him, ‘Simon, three men have arrived and they are looking for you.
korean_text: 베드로가 그 환상에 대하여 생각할 때에 성령께서 그에게 말씀하시되 두 사람이 너를 찾으니

sentences.original_text: While Peter was still thinking about his dream
sentences.korean_translation: 베드로가 아직 자신의 꿈에 대해 생각하고 있는 동안

sentences.original_text: the Holy Spirit said to him
and they are looking for you
